item.title: Final Fantasy 7’s Aerith Calls Out Creeps Tagging Voice Actors
item.description: Briana White asked fans to stop tagging voice artists in explicit content, sparking a wider conversation about boundaries in fan communities.

item.title: No Man’s Sky Boss Ridicules Similar Once Human Premium
item.description: Debate sparked after fans alleged an asset from No Man’s Sky appeared in Once Human for sale without permission, drawing comments from Hello Games.

item.title: Someone Actually Just Escaped From Tarkov
item.description: Streamer Tigz has managed to actually escape, marking a first for the game. Fans are buzzing as new strategies emerge across the community.
